post.author: $OuLjA`-
post.body:
Hi,

i'm proud to present you my first map !!
it's a fast and action paced 1on1 deathmatch map with a 'different' look.

Players: 1v1, 2 - 4

Screenshots:



you can find more Screenshots on my website:
http://www.adrianvdesign.com

check out the readme for more infos

have fun!
hope you like it.

Download: (map_souldm1.zip 17MB)

http://planetquake4.net/download.php?op=fileid&lid=2292

http://download.levitation-gaming.com/? ... ileid=2322

http://rapidshare.de/files/17431810/map ... 1.zip.html

http://www.savefile.com/files.php?fid=9949428

C&C Welcome

post.author: efx
post.body: Looks great, did you do those textures yourself?

post.author: $OuLjA`-
post.body:
hey, thanks!

no, not all... but that's in the README

post.author: efx
post.body: Ah ok, I'm still at work but I'll be checking this one out at home.

post.author: bkt
post.body: Wow, it looks really good, especially for a first map. It's got pretty simple brushwork, but the texturing and lighting really make it work! Nice job there.

post.author: $OuLjA`-
post.body:
thank you!
i'm happy you like it.

this multiplayer map was just a warmup

post.author: $OuLjA`-
post.body:
hm, not much response here

i made this map for the community...
looks like q4 mp is not very popular only on "competitive/esports" sites like ESReality.

i would like to create some singleplayer maps but don't know if q4 is the right game... haven't seen much q4 sp maps so far.

what do you think?

maybe i'll wait for Prey or some UE3 game.

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
I really like the nature/hiteck combination, and like bkt said, the lighting look nice.

You're all right, it seems that the "Quake" community and maybe all FPS modders in general have decreased for a few years...

For SP maps, if everybody wait that another one make it first...
I think there are many talented mappers/modders here (in Quake community), and if they (we ) make great things for these games, people will come back to these.

ps:What is this player model???

post.author: $OuLjA`-
post.body:
it's one of the new 'brightskins' from the q4 1.1 patch.

g_forcemodel "model_player_marine_helmeted_bright"
or
g_forcemodel "model_player_tactical_transfer_bright"

g_forceMarineModel "model_player_marine_helmeted_bright"

g_forceStroggModel "model_player_tactical_transfer_bright"

you can also see it from the multiplayer - settings window.

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
thanks.
Your plants look greats too!

post.author: $OuLjA`-
post.body:
yep, big thanks to gw

check out his map "Bubonic Falls"

post.author: hotwheeler
post.body: nice job
